author: hsiaowei
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.4.0-alpha.0` -- Big Commitments -- released! 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.4.0-alpha.0

This is an alpha release for the coming Deneb upgrade.

In addition to numerous substantive updates specific to Deneb, it also features the attnets revamp, courtesy of <@498009160982724610>.

Thank you for the *many* contributors on this front.
